pullRequest.body:
All the unnamed instances here were very long, and Moritz recently linked one of these to a newcomer.

Also slightly clean up the `Lattice` instance

nodes.body:
Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/88b33a14-0053-43f4-a27c-760f664eb0fb) for commit 4be35e2f0cdf718808f7eac53a5321f11fbe05fb.
There were [no significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/426821ca-4010-43ad-89e3-6cfdda77cafa/to/88b33a14-0053-43f4-a27c-760f664eb0fb) against commit 8b2dfa4e358ef9969cc5f519810315b205710e24.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

```suggestion
instance instNonUnitalNormedRing [NonUnitalNormedRing R] : NonUnitalNormedRing (α →ᵇ R) where
```
Let's add an alias for the `coeFn` → `coe` changes
I don't know if these changes might have a performance impact. Maybe we could land the name changes and do the other changes separately.
This is very easy to answer

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore(Topology/ContinuousFunction/Bounded): Rename instances
